newsitem.title: USA: UtiliCorp 5.3 mln share offering priced.
newsitem.headline: UtiliCorp 5.3 mln share offering priced.

text.p: UtiliCorp United Inc said on Wednesday that its 5,250,000 share offering through underwriters was priced at $27.625 per share.
It said net proceeds will be used to reduce short-term debt incurred primarily for acquisitions, construction and debt retirements.
Managing underwriters are Merrill Lynch & Co, Dean Witter Reynolds Inc, Goldman Sachs & Co, J.P. Morgan & Co Inc and PaineWebber Inc. There are about 47 million shares of common stock outstanding.
UtiliCorp is an electric and gas company.
